data_meta.titleEn: Inquiring About Airport Shuttle Service at a Hotel
data_meta.titleKo: Inquiring About Airport Shuttle Service at a Hotel

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: "Excuse me, I have a flight tomorrow morning.

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Does the hotel provide a shuttle service to the airport?"

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: The shuttle runs every hour from 6 AM to 9 PM. "

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Great! How can I reserve a seat?

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: "You can book a seat at the reception desk.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: We recommend doing it at least two hours before your departure time."

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Robert는 셔틀에 미리 자리를 잡는 방법을 묻기 위해 '예약하다'라는 단어를 사용합니다.
expressions.example_en: I would like to reserve a table for two at 7 pm.
expressions.example_ko: 저녁 7시에 두 사람 테이블을 예약하고 싶습니다.

sentences.sentence: "저희 프론트 데스크에서 좌석을 예약하실 수 있습니다.
출발 시간 최소 2시간 전에 예약하시는 것을 권장드립니다."
